title: Pakistan extends felicitations on British Queen’s birthday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP): As British Queen Elizabeth II celebrated her 95th official birthday Saturday, Pakistan extended greetings to her as well as the Royal family and people of the United Kingdom.
“Heartiest felicitations to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, the Royal Family & the people of United Kingdom on the occasion of Her Majesty’s 95th official birthday,” the Foreign Office spokesperson said in a statement.
Heartiest felicitations to Her Majesty #QueenElizabeth II,the Royal Family & the people of  on the occasion of Her Majesty’s 95th official birthday. We wish the govt. & the people of UK further progress & prosperity under Her Majesty’s sagacious watch. @FCDOGovUK @RoyalFamily
— Spokesperson  MoFA (@ForeignOfficePk) June 12, 2021
The Queen celebrates two birthdays each year: her actual birthday on 21 April and her official birthday on the second Saturday in June.
The spokesperson also wished the government and the people of UK further progress and prosperity under the Queen’s “sagacious watch.”
